Package it.polimi.ingsw.playerBoard

package it.polimi.ingsw.playerBoard
  • Interface Summary
    Interface
    Description
    Scoring
    Scoring is the interface for classes that contribute points to a player
  • Class Summary
    Class
    Description
    Board
    Board represents the board of each player It is a container of the classes which represents board's elements
    ConversionEffectArea
    ConversionEffectArea is a container for ConversionEffects in a Board
    DevelopmentCardArea
    DevelopmentCardArea is the container for development cards in a Board
    DiscountArea
    DiscountArea is a container for DiscountEffects in a Board
    LeaderCardArea
    The area of the board containing the leaderCards currently active.
    ProductionArea
    ProductionArea is a container for all production effects in a Board
  • Exception Summary
    Exception
    Description
    InvalidBoardException
    InvalidBoardException is thrown when an invalid Board is trying to get used
